snippet: This week: Students can take sides in the debates about freedom of information that have been inspired by the death of the "hacktivist" Aaron Swartz; they can learn about one idea for helping endangered species thrive; or they can write a creative...
abstract: This week: Students can take sides in the debates about freedom of information that have been inspired by the death of the "hacktivist" Aaron Swartz; they can learn about one idea for helping endangered species thrive; or they can write a creative piece inspired by a colorful feature story.

byline.original: By SARAH GROSS, JONATHAN OLSEN and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

headline.main: Common Core Practice | Aaron Swartz, Endangered Species and Chess in Harlem
